titleStmt.title: A proclamation set furthe by the Kinges Maiesty with the aduise of his highnes moost honorable counsail, the xi. day of September, in the v. yere of his Maiesties most prosperous reigne, inhibiting the melting of any his highnes coines of silver, being curraunt within his graces dominions
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1485-1509 : Henry VII).
Edward VI, King of England, 1537-1553.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
